A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While it had a few parts that didnt fit with what i expected\, it was overall a very well played out movie. it brings out the realistic humanity of Luke after his last failure\, and gives him a death similar to his teacher\, Obi Wan. Sacrificing himself to save the others so they can do more. He had up until that point cut his ties with the force\, and now that sudden flow was too much for his body. he knew the consequences of this\, but also knew that he had to do it to save the others. most people are just upset because he died\, and because he did like those before him who failed\, went into exile. thats not the luke they wanted\, but its the luke that is real.
